summary: Iteration 44 - Ciclo Passivo Integrato Module Testing Complete. Backend: 11/11 tests passed (100%). Frontend: All tabs and interactions verified working. The new /ciclo-passivo page is fully functional with Import XML, Scadenze, Riconciliazione, and Storico tabs.
critical_code_review_comments: All Ciclo Passivo endpoints are correctly implemented and working
Frontend uses inline JavaScript styles as requested by user
All interactive elements have data-testid attributes for testing
Dashboard statistics are correctly calculated from database
Import integrato correctly creates: fattura, fornitore, magazzino movements, prima nota, scadenza
seed_data_creation: Created TEST_CICLOPASSIVO and TEST-E2E prefixed test data during testing (2 scadenze visible in dashboard)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Ciclo Passivo Integrato module fully tested. Test file: /app/tests/test_ciclo_passivo_integrato.py covers all CRUD operations. The module handles: Import XML → Magazzino → Prima Nota → Scadenziario → Riconciliazione workflow. Frontend page /ciclo-passivo has 4 tabs: Import XML, Scadenze Aperte, Riconciliazione, Storico Pagamenti.

GET_dashboard_riconciliazione.description: GET /api/ciclo-passivo/dashboard-riconciliazione returns statistics with scadenze_aperte, scadenze_saldate, movimenti_non_riconciliati

POST_import_integrato.description: POST /api/ciclo-passivo/import-integrato accepts XML file and creates fattura, fornitore, magazzino movements, prima nota, scadenza

GET_suggerimenti_match.description: GET /api/ciclo-passivo/suggerimenti-match/{scadenza_id} returns scadenza details and bank movement suggestions

POST_match_manuale.description: POST /api/ciclo-passivo/match-manuale correctly validates scadenza_id and transazione_id parameters

frontend_import_tab.description: Import XML tab shows upload zone with drag&drop support and 4-step workflow explanation

frontend_scadenze_tab.description: Scadenze Aperte tab shows list of open scadenze with Riconcilia buttons

frontend_riconciliazione_tab.description: Riconciliazione tab shows split view with scadenze on left and bank movement suggestions on right

frontend_storico_tab.description: Storico Pagamenti tab shows list of completed payments

frontend_tab_navigation.description: All 4 tabs are clickable and switch content correctly

frontend_riconcilia_button.description: Clicking Riconcilia button switches to Riconciliazione tab and selects the scadenza

frontend_scadenza_selection.description: Clicking on a scadenza row in Riconciliazione tab shows details and fetches bank movement suggestions
